column5: We need the requests to be made by PM. This is going to take awhile but we will do what we can to get them done. PM  Spiel, Roy, TJ or myself.
Thanks Rick ya gots my PM
Thanks Rick ... and mine too :0
I could use my post count back... I figure it to be around 2000 or so thousand... after deleting my own account a couple of times...  I'll send a pm.  Gerritt
Please transfer my post cound - last count was at 1358 PM sent as well  Cheers, Gman
PM Sent!  Thanks!
Can I have my 59 posts moved over?  That may not sound like a lot but they're important to me
Ok Im asking for my post count back,not that big of a deal.LOL
PM sent Rick....thanks!!  dk
Can you guys also give us your count that you had on the other site? We'll do the math for ya! Trying to switch back and forth and edit is kinda...well..time consuming. Will try to get to them ASAP.
Is there no access to SQL on this and the old forum?  Be pretty easy to transfer provided user names are the same.
Please transfer my post count from the old board as small as it was at 59 I believe. Thanks Kawartha Kev
No access to SQL on old site, Raf. That's one of the big reasons we had to make the switch. We had no db control over there and they had no way of giving us access.
I'd appreciate it if you could transfer my post count (909) Thanks Rick  Bob
Please update my post count Sirs.  Each one of my 232 posts was a masterpiece worthy of fond remembrance...    Nice new board, Charles
Whatever happened to starting from the bottom, paying your dues and working your way up to the top???  Post count is 917 thanks
I dunno..prolly the same thing that happened to following a simple request........
Finding the new board a little confusing right now.  So instead of PM i'll request my count from old board here.  777 i think it was at.  Thanks,  ehg
yes please rick i would like to request my post count from old board was at 400, thanks in advance shawn
DANG...did I get mine back?  Looks like I should have looked first.
